Class Hexmap

java.lang.Object
smile.plot.swing.Shape
smile.plot.swing.Plot
smile.plot.swing.Hexmap
public class Hexmap extends Plot
Hexmap is a variant of heat map by replacing rectangle cells with hexagon cells.
